title: Blog Application
description: A blog Application allows multiple users to post, edit blogs, view other user's blogs.

title: Seat Booking App
description: Seat booking application (Backend only), where multiple users can book seats simulteneously. Seats are blocked for fixed time using soft locking technique.

title: Parking Lot
description: A parking lot management system, where slot assignment is done automatically at entry gate and payment taken at the exit gate.
